title: Lysol Sanitizing Wipes: How I Love Thee
body:
Let me start this post by stating, unequivocally, that I am NOT a corporate shill... though I am willing to listen to any and all offers.

I love Lysol's Disposable Sanitizing Wipes. As a business owner, I'm faced with two distinct challenges every single day: 1) getting customers through our doors, and 2) cleaning up poorly-aimed urine from around the toilets. These faintly scented wipes protect my delicate hands from the vile ickiness of the toliet bowl... AND they're flushable!

And if that weren't enough, they also make for great facial cleansing wipes*!

*NOTE: This statement is not true, and Moxie Cinema will not be held liable for injuries stemming from the use of Lysol-brand Sanitizing Wipes on one's face.

Uh oh! Customers are here... I gotta run. Viva La Lysol!
author: Dan
